Django Google Mailer¶

Django Google Mailer is a Django app which is an alternative to send emails using Google’s Gmail API. This is the most secure method as it uses OAuth 2.0.

Detailed documentation is in the “docs” directory.

  • Quick start
    • Gmail API setup
    • Django setup
  • Reference
    • Gmail
    • Views
    • Settings
      • GMAIL_USER
      • GMAIL_SECRET
      • GMAIL_SCOPES
